title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 350.1 - Fair sponsor; definition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 350.1 - Fair sponsor; definition

State Regulations

For purposes of this Part a fair sponsor shall mean any
organization that receives money from the State for the promotion of
agriculture and domestic arts pursuant to article 24 of the Agriculture and

Markets Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 1

350.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
